resources.string: Please check the calling card is plugged in
You sure you want to allocate it?
Customer service hotline is 10000.Self-help service hotline is 10001.Please prefix the area code before hotline when you are roaming in the country.

When you are roaming in foreign countries and Hong Kong,Macao and Taiwan regions,you can call China Telecom International Roaming Customer Service Hotline +8618918910000,calling from this phone is free,for detail information,please refer to roaming welcome message.You also can check internet http://manyou.189.cn to get customer service.

"1.Provide the address and telephone numbers of over 3000 zhongxing mobile phone customer service centers. 2.Provide introduction and activity information of the zhongxing plam services. 3.Disposal customer questions and advice over zhongxing mobile phones. 4.ZTE Home (http://www.zte.com.cn/ ) -> Technical Support -> phone service to support namely http://www.zte.com.cn/cn/products/mobile/services_support/, ZTE phone PC side software, SD card upgrade package, the online upgrade of the client, one-click upgrade tools, user manuals, software tools or documents, please visit the website and access to phone service support."
